column4: Hm.. There's only one thing keeping me from leaving windows and going 100% ubuntu
3d accleration.. the ATI drivers give me a bug where if I log out / close X I just get a black screen
Ok, things ought to be better by Breezy (with luck)
There's semi-working Free drivers for the R300s
a non lagging GUI? i watch large videos?
the few games i play play under cedega fine
We currently don't use the 3D code for the GUI or video
